pages.text: Charleston, SC General Information Eggs Up Grill 3875 West Ashley Circle, Charleston, SC 29414 +1 843-212-5255 Amenities Dog Friendly Patio Dining Mimosas Hours of Operation Order Now Order Catering Get Directions Eggs Up Grill 3875 West Ashley Circle, Charleston, SC 29414 +1 843-212-5255 Amenities Patio Dining Mimosas Hours of Operation Order Now Order Catering Charleston Menu Neighborhood Faves Eggs Up Classics Egg-Centric Hot Off The Griddle Bowls & Bennies Burgers, Melts & Sandwiches Salads Kids Meal Family Bundles Drinks A la Carte Previous Next Neighborhood Faves Blueberry Muffin $5.39 A large muffin filled with blueberries, sliced in half and grilled to a golden-brown perfection. Served with toast and home fries or grits. Served with garlic toast and a charred lemon. Order Now Coastal Crab Cake Benny $16.49 Two crab cakes stacked on toasted garlic bread with poached eggs, Hollandaise sauce, and a dash of our signature home fry spice. Served with home fries, grits, or fresh fruit. Order Now Texican Bowl $12.49 Home fries topped with crumbled chorizo sausage, jalapenos, onions, peppers, pepper jack cheese, and two eggs with a side of salsa and sour cream. Order Now Eggs Up BLT $10.99 Five strips of bacon, lettuce, tomato and mayo on grilled Tuscan bread. Add home fries or grits for an additional charge. Order Now Side Sugar-Cured Ham $5.99 No description added. Order Now Let Us Cater Your Next Event From customized box lunches to full spreads, we’ll take care of the details. Eggs Up Grill catering makes it easy and delicious. Call now to place your catering order! Phone +1 843-212-5255 Order Catering Click Here E Gift Cards Sign Up Now! About Us I am Kevin Arnold. My wife and I work hard to build a strong connection with the local community here in West Ashley. At Eggs Up Grill, guests will always experience genuine hospitality from people who live in their community and who they come to know and trust — truly neighbors serving neighbors. Our restaurants are happy places for every occasion, where all feel welcome. Eggs Up Grill is a place to come to by yourself, with family, friends, neighbors, or coworkers. Our door is always open to all.We look forward to seeing you in our restaurant. If there is anything we can do for you or our community, please let us know.
